description.en: Animation curves precision should be less than 5
description.zh: 动画曲线精度应小于5

longDescription.zh: 动画曲线精度过高会增加动画占用内存; 此规则仅面向以文本格式序列化的*.anim文件中的浮点精度
longDescription.en: High animation curve precision may cause more memory. Only plain-text serialized *.anim files could be handled by this rule.

hint.en: Open the .anim file with text editor, modify the precision of float values under m_EditorCurves::curve::m_Curve. It's recommend to correct all float values' precision in this file to under 5 by script.
hint.zh: 用文本编辑器打开.anim动画文件，修改m_EditorCurves::curve::m_Curve下的float值的精度。建议用脚本直接将此文件中所有float精度都调整为5位小数以下。

description.en: Animation curves precision should be less than 5
description.zh: 动画曲线精度应小于5

description.en: Animation should not have scale curves
description.zh: 动画不应具有缩放曲线

longDescription.zh: 动画中的缩放曲线会增加动画占用内存
longDescription.en: Scale curves in animation may cause more memory

hint.en: Open the .anim file with text editor, make no curve object with attribute equals m_Scale under m_EditorCurves or m_FloatCurves.
hint.zh: 用文本编辑器打开.anim动画文件，确认m_EditorCurves和m_FloatCurves下不包括attribute为m_Scale的curve子对象。

description.en: Animation should not have scale curves
description.zh: 动画不应具有缩放曲线

description.en: Animation curves precision should not be less than a certain value, default is 5
description.zh: 动画曲线精度应小于某个值, 默认为5

longDescription.zh: 动画曲线精度过高会增加动画占用内存; 此规则仅面向以文本格式序列化的*.anim文件中的浮点精度
longDescription.en: High animation curve precision may cause more memory. Only plain-text serialized *.anim files could be handled by this rule.

hint.en: Open the .anim file with text editor, modify the precision of float values under m_EditorCurves::curve::m_Curve. It's recommend to correct all float values' precision in this file to under 5 by script.
hint.zh: 用文本编辑器打开.anim动画文件，修改m_EditorCurves::curve::m_Curve下的float值的精度。建议用脚本直接将此文件中所有float精度都调小。

description.en: precision Limit for Animation curves
description.zh: 动画曲线精度限制

description.en: Animation curves precision should be less than %s
description.zh: 动画曲线精度应小于%s

description.en: Animation Clip Count should not be above 2 in Animation Controller
description.zh: 动画控制器中的动画剪辑个数不应超过2

longDescription.zh: 动画控制器中动画剪辑数量过多会造成动画初始化耗时过多
longDescription.en: Too many Animation Clips in Animation Controller may cause long time of initialization of Animation Clips

nameDescription.zh: 动画控制器中的动画剪辑个数

description.en: Animation Clip Count should be less than 2
description.zh: 动画剪辑个数应小于2

description.en: forceMono should be enabled for audio asset
description.zh: 应为音频资源启用forceMono

longDescription.zh: 如不需要立体声,开启forceMono可以减少内存和磁盘占用
longDescription.en: If stereo is not needed, enabling forceMono could reduce usage of memory and disk

hint.en: Check option under Inspector -> Force To Mono
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Force To Mono选项

description.en: Sound should enable forceMono to save both storage and memory
description.zh: 音频应该启用forceMono，以节省存储和内存

description.en: check the Audio compression format for iOS platform
description.zh: 检查iOS平台的音频压缩格式

longDescription.en: check the Audio compression format for iOS platform
longDescription.zh: 检查iOS平台的音频压缩格式

hint.en: Check option under Inspector -> iOS Tab -> Load Type
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> iOS Tab -> Compression Format选项

description.en: Audio clip for iOS platform should be MP3
description.zh: iOS平台的音频剪辑应使用MP3格式

description.en: Audio clip format for default platform is not suitable for iOS
description.zh: 默认平台的音频剪辑格式不适用于iOS

description.en: check the Audio compression format for Android platform
description.zh: 检查安卓平台的音频压缩格式

longDescription.en: check the Audio compression format for Android platform
longDescription.zh: 检查安卓平台的音频压缩格式

hint.en: Check option under Inspector -> Android Tab -> Load Type
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Android Tab -> Compression Format选项

description.en: Audio clip for Android platform should be Vorbis
description.zh: 安卓平台的音频剪辑应使用Vorbis格式

description.en: Audio clip format for default platform is not suitable for Android
description.zh: 默认平台的音频剪辑格式不适用于安卓

description.en: check audio load type
description.zh: 检查音频加载类型

longDescription.en: check audio load type
longDescription.zh: 检查音频加载类型

hint.en: Check option under: Inspector -> (Platform Tab) -> Load Type
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> (Platform Tab) -> Load Type选项

description.en: Short sound effect for %s should use DecompressOnLoad
description.zh: %s 的短音效应使用DecompressOnLoad

description.en: Normal sound effect for %s should use CompressedInMemory
description.zh: %s 的常规音效应使用CompressedInMemory

description.en: Music for %s should use Streaming
description.zh: %s 的音乐应该使用Streaming

description.en: CompanyName should be set
description.zh: 应设置CompanyName

longDescription.en: CompanyName should be set
longDescription.zh: 应设置CompanyName

hint.en: Check setting under: File -> Build Settings -> Player Settings -> Player -> Company Name
hint.zh: 检查File -> Build Settings -> Player Settings -> Player -> Company Name的设置

description.en: CompanyName should not be DefaultCompany
description.zh: CompanyName不应设置为DefaultCompany

rules.name: Build Target Icons should be set

description.en: Build target icons should be set
description.zh: 应设置Build Target Icons

longDescription.en: Build target icons should be set
longDescription.zh: 应设置Build Target Icons

hint.en: Check setting under: File -> Build Settings -> Player Settings -> Player -> Default Icon
hint.zh: 检查File -> Build Settings -> Player Settings -> Player -> Default Icon的设置

description.en: Build Target Icons for %s should be set
description.zh: 应设置 %s 的Build Target Icons

description.en: GraphicsJobs should be set to true
description.zh: 应设置开启GraphicsJobs

longDescription.en: This option will enable multiple thread for graphic tasks. This feature is experimental and may introduce new crashes. Test accordingly.
longDescription.zh: 这项设置会为图形任务开启多线程. 但这个是实验性质的, 会引起新的问题. 请自行测试.

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Graphic Jobs(Experimental)*
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Graphic Jobs(Experimental)*的设置

description.en: Try enabling graphicJobs and testing your application
description.zh: 尝试开启graphicJobs并测试

description.en: BakeCollisionMeshes should be set to true
description.zh: 应设置开启BakeCollisionMeshes

longDescription.en: PreBaked collision meshes can reduce loading/initialization times though increase build times and sizes
longDescription.zh: 这项设置可以减少加载/初始化的时间, 虽然会增加一些构建时间和包体积

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Prebake Collision Meshes
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> PreBake Collision Meshes的设置

description.en: Consider enabling Prebake Collision Meshes if physics is used in project
description.zh: 如果在项目中启用了physics, 可以考虑开启Prebake Collision Meshes选项

description.en: StripEngineCode should be set to true
description.zh: 应设置开启StripEngineCode

longDescription.en: Disabling StripEngineCode will increase package size
longDescription.zh: 关闭StripEngineCode会增加包体积

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Strip Engine Code
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Strip Engine Code的设置

description.en: Disabling StripEngineCode will increase package size
description.zh: 关闭StripEngineCode会增加包体积

description.en: AutoSyncTransforms should be set to false in Physics
description.zh: 在Physics设置中应关闭AutoSyncTransforms

longDescription.en: AutoSyncTransforms is to ensure backwards compatibility with older version of Unity and will add more CPU cost
longDescription.zh: AutoSyncTransforms选项是为了兼容老版本的Unity而设立的, 会增加CPU的使用

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> Physics -> Auto Sync Transforms
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> Physics -> Auto Sync Transforms的设置

description.en: Enable AutoSyncTransforms in Physics will add more CPU cost
description.zh: 在Physics设置中开启AutoSyncTransforms会增加CPU的使用

description.en: boxes of LayerCollisionMatrix should not be all ticked in Physics
description.zh: 在Physics设置中LayerCollisionMatrix中的格子不应该都勾选上

longDescription.en: This will increase CPU work and should un-tick the unnecessary boxes
longDescription.zh: 这会增加CPU的负担, 应该取消勾选那些没有必要的格子

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> Physics -> Layer Collision Matrix
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> Physics -> Layer Collision Matrix的设置

description.en: Boxes of LayerCollisionMatrix should not be all ticked in Physics
description.zh: 在Physics设置中LayerCollisionMatrix中的格子不应该都勾选上

description.en: AutoSyncTransforms should be set to false in Physics2D setting
description.zh: 在Physics2D设置中应关闭AutoSyncTransforms

longDescription.en: AutoSyncTransforms is to ensure backwards compatibility with older version of Unity and will add more CPU cost
longDescription.zh: AutoSyncTransforms选项是为了兼容老版本的Unity而设立的, 会增加CPU的使用

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> Physics2D -> Auto Sync Transforms
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> Physics2D -> Auto Sync Transforms的设置

description.en: Enable AutoSyncTransforms in Physics2D will add more CPU cost
description.zh: 在Physics2D设置中开启AutoSyncTransforms会增加CPU的使用

description.en: boxes of LayerCollisionMatrix should not be all ticked in Physics2D
description.zh: 在Physics2D设置中LayerCollisionMatrix中的格子不应该都勾选上

longDescription.en: This will increase CPU work and should un-tick the unnecessary boxes
longDescription.zh: 这会增加CPU的负担, 应该取消勾选那些没有必要的格子

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> Physics2D -> Layer Collision Matrix
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> Physics2D -> Layer Collision Matrix的设置

description.en: Boxes of LayerCollisionMatrix should not be all ticked in Physics2D
description.zh: 在Physics2D设置中LayerCollisionMatrix中的格子不应该都勾选上

description.en: StandardShaderQuality should be same across all Graphics Tiers
description.zh: StandardShaderQuality选项在所有Graphics Tier中应相同

longDescription.en: This will increase build times and package size unless you want to support devices with a very wide range of capabilities
longDescription.zh: 这会增加编译时间和包体积, 除非你想要支持很多性能跨度很大的设备

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> Graphics -> Tiers -> Standard Shader Quality
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> Graphics -> Tiers -> Standard Shader Quality的设置

description.en: StandardShaderQuality should be same across all Graphics Tiers
description.zh: StandardShaderQuality选项在所有Graphics Tier中应相同

description.en: ManagedStrippingLevel in Android should not be Low or Disabled
description.zh: Android设置中的ManagedStrippingLevel选项不应为Low或者Disabled

longDescription.en: This will increase package size
longDescription.zh: 这会增加包体积

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Managed Stripping Level
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Managed Stripping Level的设置

description.en: ManagedStrippingLevel in Android should not be Low or Disabled, Change it to Medium or High
description.zh: Android设置中的ManagedStrippingLevel选项应为Medium或者High

description.en: Architecture in iOS should not be Universal
description.zh: iOS设置中的Architecture选项不应为Universal

longDescription.en: This will increase package size and set it to ARM64 if the project isn't intended to support 32-bit iOS devices.
longDescription.zh: 这会增加包体积. 如果工程并不准备支持32位的 iOS 设备, 将其设为 ARM64.

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Architecture
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Architecture的设置

description.en: Architecture in iOS should not be Universal
description.zh: iOS设置中的Architecture选项不应为Universal

description.en: AccelerometerFrequency in iOS should be Disabled
description.zh: iOS设置中的AccelerometerFrequency选项应为 Disabled

longDescription.en: Disabling AccelerometerFrequency will save CPU processing time if the project doesn't use device's accelerometer
longDescription.zh: 如果项目没有用到设备的加速度计, 禁用 AccelerometerFrequency 可以节省一些 CPU 处理时间

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Accelerometer Frequency
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Accelerometer Frequency的设置

description.en: AccelerometerFrequency in iOS should be Disabled
description.zh: iOS设置中的AccelerometerFrequency选项应为 Disabled

description.en: There should be only Metal in GraphicsAPIs in iOS
description.zh: 在 iOS 的 GraphicsAPIs 设置里应只包含 Metal

longDescription.en: Only enabling Metal in GraphicsAPIs will reduce build size and have a better CPU performance if the minimum spec target device supports Metal
longDescription.zh: 如果设备支持Metal, 在 GraphicsAPIs 里只开启 Metal 可以减少包体积和得到更好的 CPU 表现

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> GraphicsAPIs
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> GraphicsAPIs的设置

description.en: There should be only Metal in GraphicsAPIs in iOS
description.zh: 在 iOS 的 GraphicsAPIs 设置里应只包含 Metal

description.en: ManagedStrippingLevel in iOS should not be Low
description.zh: iOS设置中的ManagedStrippingLevel选项不应为Low

longDescription.en: This will increase package size
longDescription.zh: 这会增加包体积

hint.en: Check setting under: Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Managed Stripping Level
hint.zh: 检查Editor -> Project Settings -> PlayerSettings -> Managed Stripping Level的设置

description.en: ManagedStrippingLevel in iOS should not be Low, Change it to Medium or High
description.zh: iOS设置中的ManagedStrippingLevel选项应为Medium或者High

description.en: Project should not use Resources system for assets management
description.zh: 不建议使用Resources系统来管理asset

longDescription.en: Resources system is obsolete and may requiring extra bootstrap time for application.
longDescription.zh: 使用Resources系统可能会延长程序的启动时间。此系统已经过时，不建议使用。

nameDescription.en: Check Resources Folder under Project Path
nameDescription.zh: 检查项目目录下是否存在Resources文件夹

description.en: Project should not use Resources system for assets management
description.zh: 不建议使用Resources系统来管理asset

description.en: Read/Write flag should be disabled for FBX asset
description.zh: 应禁用FBX资源的读/写标志

longDescription.en: Enabling Read/Write flag of FBX could cause double size of memory usage
longDescription.zh: 开启FBX资源的读/写标志会导致双倍的内存占用

description.en: FBX should disable Read/Write flag
description.zh: FBX资源的读/写标志应该被禁用

description.en: OptimizeMesh should be enabled for Mesh asset
description.zh: 应为网格资源启用OptimizeMesh

longDescription.en: Enabling OptimizeMesh can reduce the size of mesh asset
longDescription.zh: 为网格资源启用OptimizeMesh可以减少最终游戏包的大小

hint.en: Check option under: Inspector -> Model Tab -> Meshes -> Optimize mesh
hint.zh: 查看Inspector -> Model Tab -> Meshes -> Optimize mesh选项

description.en: OptimizeMesh should be enabled for Mesh asset
description.zh: 应为网格资源启用OptimizeMesh

description.en: Compression should be Optimal for Animation asset
description.zh: 动画资源应该使用最佳压缩方式

longDescription.en: Compression should be Optimal to raise loading efficiency
longDescription.zh: 动画资源使用最佳压缩方式可以提高加载效率

nameDescription.zh: 检查动画资源压缩方式

hint.en: Check option under: Inspector -> Animation Tab -> Anim. Compression
hint.zh: 查看Inspector -> Animation Tab -> Anim. Compression选项

description.en: Compression should be Optimal for Animation asset
description.zh: 动画资源应该使用最佳压缩方式

description.en: There is too many vertices in FBX asset, default limit is 500
description.zh: 在FBX资源中有太多的顶点, 默认阈值是500

longDescription.en: Too many vertices in FBX asset, check if it is necessary
longDescription.zh: FBX资源资源中有太多的顶点, 请检查是否必要

description.en: Vertex Count Limit
description.zh: 顶点数量限制

description.en: Too many vertices in FBX asset
description.zh: FBX资源资源中有太多的顶点

description.en: OptimizeGameObjects should be true for Animation asset
description.zh: 动画资源应该勾选OptimizeGameObjects选项

longDescription.en: OptimizeGameObjects should be true to reduce CPU cost
longDescription.zh: 动画资源应该勾选OptimizeGameObjects选项来减少CPU消耗

hint.en: Check option under: Inspector -> Rig Tab -> Optimize Game Objects
hint.zh: 查看Inspector -> Rig Tab -> Optimize Game Objects选项

description.en: OptimizeGameObjects should be true for Animation asset
description.zh: 动画资源应该勾选OptimizeGameObjects选项

description.en: There is too many skeletons in FBX asset, default limit is 50
description.zh: 此FBX资源中骨骼数量超过阈值（默认为50）

longDescription.en: Too many skeletons in FBX asset, check if it is necessary
longDescription.zh: 此FBX资源资源中有太多的骨骼, 请检查是否必要

description.en: Skeleton Count Limit
description.zh: 骨骼数量限制

description.en: Too many skeletons in FBX asset
description.zh: FBX资源资源中骨骼数量过多

description.en: Read/Write flag should be disabled for Mesh asset
description.zh: 应为网格资源禁用读/写标志

longDescription.en: Enabling Read/Write flag of Mesh could cause double size of memory usage
longDescription.zh: 开启Mesh资源的读/写标志会导致双倍的内存占用

nameDescription.zh: 检查网格资源读/写标记

description.en: Mesh should disable Read/Write flag
description.zh: 网格资源应禁用读/写标志

description.en: Read/Write flag should be disabled for Model asset
description.zh: 应为模型资源禁用读/写标志

longDescription.en: Enabling Read/Write flag of Model could cause double size of memory usage
longDescription.zh: 开启M资源的读/写标志会导致双倍的内存占用

nameDescription.zh: 检查模型资源读/写标记

description.en: Model should disable Read/Write flag
description.zh: 模型资源应禁用读/写标志

description.en: Particle system rendering mesh shouldn't set large MAX Particle limit, default limit is 30
description.zh: 渲染Mesh的粒子系统不宜设置过高的粒子总数, 默认阈值为30

longDescription.zh: 当粒子系统渲染Mesh时(Inspector: Particle System -> Renderer -> Render Mode == Mesh), 相比于渲染Billboard时计算资源消耗会明显上升，因此需要对粒子总数加以限制
longDescription.en: When a particle system's render mode is set to Mesh, the computation cost per particle item would be much higher comparing to render mode on Billboard. It's recommended to set lower Max Particles limit.

nameDescription.zh: 检查最高粒子总数限制

hint.en: Check the setting under: Inspector -> Particle System -> Max Particles
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Particle System -> Max Particles配置

description.en: Particle system rendering mesh shouldn't set large MAX Particle limit
description.zh: 渲染Mesh的粒子系统不宜设置过高的粒子总数

description.en: Particle system rendering mesh shouldn't set high emit rate, should not be more than 5
description.zh: 渲染Mesh的粒子系统不宜设置过高的粒子发射速率, 不应超过5

nameDescription.zh: 检查粒子系统的发射速率

longDescription.zh: 当粒子系统渲染Mesh时(Inspector: Particle System -> Renderer -> Render Mode == Mesh), 相比于渲染Billboard时计算资源消耗会明显上升，因此需要对粒子发射速率加以限制
longDescription.en: When a particle system's render mode is set to Mesh, the computation cost per particle item would be much higher comparing to render mode on Billboard. It's recommended to set lower Emit Rate.

hint.en: Check the setting under: Inspector -> Particle System -> Emission -> Rate over Time/Distance
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Particle System -> Emission -> Rate over Time/Distance配置

description.en: The emit rate threshold to check
description.zh: 要检查的发射速率阈值大小

description.en: Particle system rendering mesh shouldn't set high emit rate
description.zh: 渲染Mesh的粒子系统不宜设置过高的粒子发射速率

description.en: Enabling motion vectors will increase accuracy of skinned mesh at the cost of double memory usage
description.zh: 启用Skinned Motion Vectors将以消耗双倍内存为代价提高蒙皮网格的精度

longDescription.en: Enabling Skinned Motion Vectors will make renderer generate vectors using skinning data from current and last frame to calculate the per-pixel object movement, which would require double buffer together with double GPU memory usage
longDescription.zh: 启用Skinned Motion Vectors会使渲染器同时使用当前帧和上一帧的蒙皮网络来渲染目标的动画以提高精度，从而需要双倍大小的缓冲区并占用双倍的显存

description.en: Enabling motion vectors will increase accuracy of skinned mesh at the cost of double memory usage
description.zh: 启用Skinned Motion Vectors将以消耗双倍内存为代价提高蒙皮网格的精度

description.en: Meshes referenced by prefab should turn off Read/Write flag.
description.zh: 被预制件关联的网格资源应该关闭读/写标记

longDescription.en: Meshes referenced by prefab should turn off Read/Write flag.
longDescription.zh: 被预制件关联的网格资源应该关闭读/写标记

description.en: Meshes referenced by prefab should turn off Read/Write flag.
description.zh: 被预制件关联的网格资源应该关闭读/写标记

description.en: Particle system rendering mesh shouldn't set large MAX Particle limit, should not be more than 30
description.zh: 渲染Mesh的粒子系统不宜设置过高的粒子总数, 不应超过30

longDescription.zh: 当粒子系统渲染Mesh时(Inspector: Particle System -> Renderer -> Render Mode == Mesh), 相比于渲染Billboard时计算资源消耗会明显上升，因此需要对粒子总数加以限制
longDescription.en: When a particle system's render mode is set to Mesh, the computation cost per particle item would be much higher comparing to render mode on Billboard. It's recommended to set lower Max Particles limit.

nameDescription.zh: 检查最高粒子总数限制

hint.en: Check the setting under: Inspector -> Particle System -> Max Particles
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Particle System -> Max Particles配置

description.en: MAX Particle limit
description.zh: 最高粒子总数限制

description.en: Particle system rendering mesh shouldn't set large MAX Particle limit
description.zh: 渲染Mesh的粒子系统不宜设置过高的粒子总数

description.en: Enable prewarm in particle system may cause lagging in games.
description.zh: 粒子系统开启prewarm可能会导致游戏局部运行卡顿

longDescription.en: Enable prewarm in particle system will increase CPU cost at the beginning of the scene and may cause lagging. Better to disable it if not needed.
longDescription.zh: 粒子系统开启prewarm会在场景开始时增加CPU消耗, 可能引起卡顿, 如可不用最好关闭

description.en: Enable prewarm in particle system may cause lagging in games
description.zh: 粒子系统开启prewarm可能会导致游戏局部运行卡顿

description.en: All game objects in scene should be associated with tag
description.zh: 场景中的所有GameObject都应当添加tag

longDescription.en: All game objects in scene should be associated with tag
longDescription.zh: 场景中的所有GameObject都应当添加tag

description.en: Such scene contains untagged game objects
description.zh: 场景包含未添加tag的GameObject

description.en: A scene shouldn't contain more than one Audio Listener
description.zh: 一个场景不应包含多个Audio Listener

longDescription.en: A scene shouldn't contain more than one Audio Listener
longDescription.zh: 一个场景不应包含多个Audio Listener

hint.en: Check Audio Listener component under scene's all GameObject
hint.zh: 检查场景中所有GameObject下的Audio Listener组件

description.en: Such scene contains multiple audio listeners
description.zh: 场景包含多个音频侦听器

description.en: A scene should not contain mesh collider
description.zh: 场景不应包含mesh collider

longDescription.en: Mesh Collider create more precise and authentic collision detection comparing to Sphere or Box Collider at a cost of higher processing overhead, so it is best to use Mesh Collider sparingly.
longDescription.zh: Mesh Collider可以在场景中提供更精细化的碰撞检测，随之而来也会消耗大量计算资源，建议审慎使用。

hint.en: Check Mesh Collider component under scene's all GameObject
hint.zh: 检查场景中所有GameObject下的Mesh Collider组件

description.en: Such scene contains mesh collider
description.zh: 场景包含了mesh collider

description.en: Render setting of fog should be turned off for mobile platforms
description.zh: 在移动平台，应在设置里关闭对雾的渲染

longDescription.en: It's recommended to turn off render setting of fog on mobile platforms to save computation resource.
longDescription.zh: 在移动平台，建议在渲染设置中关闭对雾的渲染以节省计算资源。

hint.en: Check option under: Window -> Rendering -> Lighting Settings -> Scene -> Other Settings -> Fog
hint.zh: 检查Window -> Rendering -> Lighting Settings -> Scene -> Other Settings -> Fog选项

description.en: Render setting of fog should be turned off for mobile platforms
description.zh: 在移动平台，应在设置里关闭雾的渲染

description.en: Shadow resolution of lights in scene should be consistent with project setting
description.zh: 场景中灯光的阴影分辨率应与项目设置一致

longDescription.en: Shadow resolution of lights in scene should be consistent with project setting
longDescription.zh: 场景中灯光的阴影分辨率应与项目设置一致

hint.en: Check option under: Inspector -> Light -> Shadow Type -> Realtime Shadows -> Resolution, recommending 'Use Quality Settings'.
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Light -> Shadow Type -> Realtime Shadows -> Resolution选项，建议使用'Use Quality Settings'.

description.en: Shadow resolution of lights in scene should be consistent with project setting
description.zh: 场景中灯光的阴影分辨率应与项目设置一致

description.en: Static GameObjects in scene should not associate rigidbody
description.zh: 场景中的静态GameObject不应关联Rigidbody

longDescription.en: Static GameObjects's rigidbody components are useless.
longDescription.zh: 静态GameObject的Rigidbody模块是无用的。

description.en: Static game object should not associate rigidbody
description.zh: 静态GameObject不应关联Rigidbody

description.en: Canvas with too many components may affect the performance of UI refreshing
description.zh: 包含太多组件的Canvas可能会影响UI刷新的性能

longDescription.en: Canvas with too many components may affect the performance of UI refreshing, and may further affect FPS.
longDescription.zh: 包含太多组件的Canvas可能会影响UI刷新的性能，并进一步影响应用的帧率。

description.en: Canvas with too many components may affect the performance of UI refreshing
description.zh: 包含太多组件的Canvas可能会影响UI刷新的性能

description.en: Scene contains UI components outside the screen
description.zh: 场景包含屏幕外的UI组件

longDescription.en: UI components may be placed outside the screen dual to miss configuring, they are invisible but still be rendered.
longDescription.zh: 放置在屏幕外的UI组件尽管不可见仍会消耗渲染资源，建议删掉此组件或者修正可能出现的设置错误。

description.en: Scene contains UI components outside the screen
description.zh: 场景包含屏幕外的UI组件

description.en: there is Animator with applyRootMotion true in Scene
description.zh: 场景中包含勾选了applyRootMotion选项的Animator组件

longDescription.en: applyRootMotion should be set to false in Animator of Scene if root motion movement is not needed.
longDescription.zh: 如果不需要进行根骨骼动画位移, 建议关闭场景中Animator组件的applyRootMotion选项。

nameDescription.zh: 检查场景Animator组件中的ApplyRootMotion选项

description.en: there is Animator with applyRootMotion true in Scene
description.zh: 场景中包含勾选了applyRootMotion选项的Animator组件

description.en: there is Animator with cullingMode AlwaysAnimate in Scene
description.zh: 场景中包含cullingMode为AlwaysAnimate的Animator组件

longDescription.en: Setting cullingMode to AlwaysAnimate in Animator of Scene will cause high CPU usage.
longDescription.zh: 场景中Animator组件的cullingMode是AlwaysAnimate会增加CPU使用率。

description.en: there is Animator with cullingMode AlwaysAnimate in Scene
description.zh: 场景中包含cullingMode为AlwaysAnimate的Animator组件

description.en: MonoBehaviour script should not have empty update method
description.zh: MonoBehavior脚本不应具有空的Update方法

longDescription.en: MonoBehaviour script should not have empty update method
longDescription.zh: MonoBehavior脚本不应具有空的Update方法

description.en: MonoBehaviour script should not have empty update method
description.zh: MonoBehavior脚本不应具有空的update方法

description.en: OnGUI method should not be used because of high memory usage
description.zh: 由于内存使用率高，不应使用OnGUI方法

longDescription.en: OnGUI method should not be used because of high memory usage
longDescription.zh: 由于内存使用率高，不应使用OnGUI方法

hint.en: IMGUI is an obsolete UI system, may only used in debug mode.
hint.zh: IMGUI是过时的UI系统，仅建议在开发调试时使用。

description.en: OnGUI method should not be used because of high memory usage
description.zh: 由于内存使用率高，不应使用OnGUI方法

description.en: MonoBehaviour script should not have empty method
description.zh: MonoBehavior脚本不应具有空的方法

longDescription.en: MonoBehaviour script should not have empty method
longDescription.zh: MonoBehavior脚本不应具有空的方法

description.en: monoBehaviour script should not have empty method
description.zh: MonoBehavior脚本不应具有空的方法

description.en: Texture Count in Shader should be less than 3
description.zh: Shader中的纹理个数应小于3

longDescription.en: Too many textures in Shader may increase GPU cost
longDescription.zh: Shader中过多的纹理可能会增加GPU消耗

description.en: Texture Count in Shader should be less than 3
description.zh: Shader中的纹理个数应小于3

description.en: Texture Count in Shader should be less than a certain value, default is 3
description.zh: Shader中的纹理个数应小于某个值, 默认为3

longDescription.en: Too many textures in Shader may increase GPU cost
longDescription.zh: Shader中过多的纹理可能会增加GPU消耗

description.en: Shader texture count limit
description.zh: Shader中纹理数量限制

description.en: Texture Count in Shader should be less than %s
description.zh: Shader中的纹理个数应小于%s

description.en: Read/Write flag should be disabled for Texture asset
description.zh: 应禁用纹理资源的读/写标志

longDescription.en: Enabling Read/Write flag of Texture could cause double size of memory usage
longDescription.zh: 开启纹理资源的读/写标志会导致双倍的内存占用

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Advanced -> Read/Write Enabled
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Advanced -> Read/Write Enabled选项

description.en: Texture should disable Read/Write
description.zh: 纹理资源的读/写标志应被禁用

description.en: Mipmap flag should be disabled for uncompressed texture asset
description.zh: 未压缩的纹理资源应禁用Mipmap标志

longDescription.en: Enabling mipmap flag for uncompressed texture will increase memory usage
longDescription.zh: 未压缩的纹理资源启用Mipmap标志会增加内存占用

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Advanced -> Generate Mip Maps
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Advanced -> Generate Mip Maps选项

description.en: Texture without compression should disable mipmap
description.zh: 未压缩的纹理应该禁用mipmap

description.en: Texture of type Sprite should disable mipmap
description.zh: 类型为Sprite的纹理应当禁用mipmap

description.en: check the Texture compression format for iOS platform
description.zh: 检查iOS平台的纹理压缩格式

longDescription.en: check the Texture compression format for iOS platform
longDescription.zh: 检查iOS平台的纹理压缩格式

nameDescription.en: the Texture compression format for iOS platform

hint.en: If you decide to use default format setting, check the option under: Inspector -> Default -> Format. If you want to use platform-specific setting, navigate to the iOS tab aside, check 'Override for iOS' and modify the Format option below.
hint.zh: 如果希望对各平台统一设置压缩格式，检查Inspector -> Default -> Format选项; 如果希望为iOS平台单独设置，打开旁边的iOS选项卡，勾选Override for iOS并检查下面的Format选项

description.en: Texture format for iOS platform should be astc
description.zh: iOS平台的纹理格式应该是astc

description.en: Use default for iOS platform, but the format is not Automatic
description.zh: 对iOS平台使用默认值，但格式不是Automatic

description.en: check the Texture compression format for Android platform
description.zh: 检查Android平台的纹理压缩格式

longDescription.en: check the Texture compression format for Android platform
longDescription.zh: 检查Android平台的纹理压缩格式

nameDescription.en: the Texture compression format for Android platform

hint.en: If you decide to use default format setting, check the option under: Inspector -> Default -> Format. If you want to use platform-specific setting, navigate to the Android tab aside, check 'Override for Android' and modify the Format option below.
hint.zh: 如果希望对各平台统一设置压缩格式，检查Inspector -> Default -> Format选项; 如果希望为Android平台单独设置，打开旁边的Android选项卡，勾选Override for Android并检查下面的Format选项

description.en: Texture format for Android with OpenGLES3 or later should be astc
description.zh: 带有OpenGLES3或更高版本的Android的纹理格式应该是astc

description.en: Texture format for Android with OpenGLES2 or earlier should be etc
description.zh: 带有OpenGLES2或更低版本的Android的纹理格式应该是etc

description.en: Use default for Android platform, but the format is not Automatic
description.zh: 对安卓平台使用默认值，但格式不是Automatic

description.en: Size should be power-of-two for Texture asset
description.zh: 纹理资源的大小应该是2的幂次

longDescription.en: Texture with none power-of-two size will fail compressing to ETC1 or PVRTC format. Autoscaling to POT may cause memory usage or texture quality issues.
longDescription.zh: 大小非2的幂次的纹理资源将无法使用ETC1和PVRTC压缩格式。在导入时自动伸缩为2的幂次也可能会导致内存占用或者贴图质量问题。

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Advanced -> Non-Power of 2. A better way of fixing is using texture with original POT size.
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Advanced -> Non-Power of 2选项. 建议使用原始大小为2的幂次的贴图.

description.en: Texture size is not power-of-two
description.zh: 纹理大小不是2的幂次

description.en: Texture's original size is not power-of-two. Upscaling to POT will increase memory usage.
description.zh: 纹理的原始大小不是2的幂次；导入时自动扩大成2的幂次会导致内存占用上升

description.en: Texture's original size is not power-of-two. Downscaling to POT may affect quality.
description.zh: 纹理的原始大小不是2的幂次；导入时自动缩小成2的幂次可能会影响贴图质量

description.en: Check texture size larger than a certain value, default is 512*512
description.zh: 检查纹理大小是否大于某个值，默认值为 512*512

longDescription.en: Textures with over size will cost more memory
longDescription.zh: 过大的纹理资源会更多的消耗内存

description.en: The width threshold to check
description.zh: 要检查的宽度阈值大小

description.en: The height threshold to check
description.zh: 要检查的高度阈值大小

description.en: Texture is larger than %s * %s
description.zh: 纹理大于 %s * %s

description.en: Aniso level should not >1 for Texture asset
description.zh: 纹理资源的Aniso级别不应大于1

longDescription.en: Texture with Aniso level setting over 1 will require larger memory usage and sampling rate
longDescription.zh: Aniso级别大于1的纹理资源会增加内存占用和采样率

hint.en: Check the slide bar under: Inspector -> Aniso Level
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Aniso Level滑动条

description.en: Texture aniso level >1
description.zh: 纹理资源的Aniso级别大于1

description.en: It's recommended not to use Trilinear as filter mode for Texture
description.zh: 纹理资源的过滤模式不建议为Trilinear

longDescription.en: It's not recommended to use Trilinear as texture filter mode concerning its high computation resource usage.
longDescription.zh: 纹理的过滤模式一般不建议使用Trilinear，会占用较高的计算资源。

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Filter Mode
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Filter Mode选项

nameDescription.zh: 检查纹理资源的过滤模式

description.en: Texture filter mode is not Bilinear
description.zh: 纹理使用的过滤模式不是Bilinear

description.en: Texture filter mode is Trilinear
description.zh: 纹理使用了Trilinear过滤模式

description.en: If a texture contains empty alpha channel, 'Alpha Source' flag should be turned off
description.zh: 如果纹理包含空的alpha通道，则应禁用'Alpha源'标志

longDescription.en: If all pixel value of such texture's alpha channel are set to 0, or all set to 255, 'Alpha Source' flag should be turned off otherwise it will waste memory.
longDescription.zh: 如果纹理的alpha通道全部为0，或者全部为255，可以认为其中不包含有效信息，此时应禁用'Alpha源'标志，否则会浪费这部分的内存。

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Alpha Source
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Alpha Source选项

description.en: Alpha Source flag for textures with empty Alpha channel should be turned off
description.zh: 应禁用具有空Alpha通道的纹理的‘Alpha源’标志

description.en: Pure color texture may waste memory
description.zh: 纯色纹理会浪费内存

longDescription.en: The usage of pure color texture may could be replaced with configurations, please check. This issue will be only reported when the pure color texture is larger than certain value (default is 16 * 16) in case there is no replacement.
longDescription.zh: 纯色纹理的使用可能可以由一些设置来代替。由于某些情况下纯色纹理是必不可少的，此警告仅会在所使用的纹理较大(大于设定值, 默认为16x16)时才会触发。

description.en: The width threshold to check fro pure color
description.zh: 要检查纯色图片的宽度阈值大小

description.en: The height threshold to check for pure color
description.zh: 要检查纯色图片的高度阈值大小

description.en: Pure color texture may waste memory
description.zh: 纯色纹理会浪费内存

description.en: Texture with large transparent edge should be cropped to save memory
description.zh: 边缘有较大透明部分的纹理应裁剪以节省内存

longDescription.en: Texture with large transparent edge should be cropped to save memory
longDescription.zh: 边缘有较大透明部分的纹理应裁剪以节省内存

description.en: Texture with large transparent edge should be cropped to save memory
description.zh: 边缘有较大透明部分的纹理应裁剪以节省内存

description.en: Repeat wrap mode may cause unexpected edge representing on the texture
description.zh: Repeat Wrap模式可能会导致纹理上出现意外的边缘

nameDescription.zh: 检查纹理重复环绕模式

longDescription.en: Repeat wrap mode may cause unexpected edge representing on the texture
longDescription.zh: Repeat Wrap模式可能会导致纹理上出现意外的边缘

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Wrap Mode
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Wrap Mode选项

description.en: Repeat wrap mode may cause unexpected edge representing on the texture
description.zh: 重复环绕模式可能会导致纹理上出现意外的边缘

description.en: Check duplicate texture
description.zh: 检查重复纹理

longDescription.en: Check duplicate texture
longDescription.zh: 检查重复纹理

description.en: Texture Duplicate
description.zh: 纹理重复

description.en: Check sprite fill rate for Texture asset, default threshold is 0.5 and only sprite type will be checked
description.zh: 检查纹理资源的sprite填充率，默认阈值为0.5，并且只检查sprite类型

nameDescription.zh: 检查精灵图纹理填充率

longDescription.en: Low fill rate of sprite map will cause waste of GPU memory
longDescription.zh: 填充率是精灵图分割后的有效面积与总面积的比率，较低的精灵图纹理填充率会导致显存的浪费。

hint.en: Try reordering the structure of sprite map to vanish blank part and increase fill part.
hint.zh: 尝试重新编排精灵图，尽量缩小总面积以提高填充率

description.en: The fill rate threshold to check
description.zh: 要检查的填充率阈值

description.en: Whether to only check sprite asset
description.zh: 是否只检查sprite资源

description.en: Sprite fill rate lower than %s
description.zh: sprite填充率低于 %s

description.en: Check texture size larger than a certain value, default is 512*512 and 1024*1024
description.zh: 检查纹理大小是否大于某个值，默认值为 512*512与1024*1024

longDescription.en: Textures with over size will cost more memory
longDescription.zh: 过大的纹理资源会更多的消耗内存

description.en: The size threshold to check, use * to split width and height and , to split each size, default is 512*512,1024*1024
description.zh: 要检查的尺寸阈值大小, 用*分隔宽度和高度, 用,分隔每个尺寸阈值, 默认为512*512,1024*1024

description.en: Texture is larger than %s * %s
description.zh: 纹理大于 %s * %s

description.en: Size of imported video should not over limit, default at 256MB
description.zh: 导入的视频文件大小应小于某一限制，默认为256MB

longDescription.en: Size of imported video should not be over limit.
longDescription.zh: 导入的视频文件体积不应过大

description.en: Limit for video size
description.zh: 视频大小限制

description.en: Video size over %sMB
description.zh: 视频文件大小高于 %sMB

description.en: Read/Write flag should be disabled for SpriteAtlas asset
description.zh: 应禁用图集资源的读/写标志

longDescription.en: Enabling Read/Write flag of SpriteAtlas could cause double size of memory usage
longDescription.zh: 开启图集资源的读/写标志会导致双倍的内存占用

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Texture -> Read/Write Enabled
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Texture -> Read/Write Enabled选项

description.en: SpriteAtlas should disable Read/Write
description.zh: 图集资源的读/写标志应被禁用

description.en: Mipmap flag should be disabled for SpriteAtlas asset
description.zh: 图集资源应禁用Mipmap标志

longDescription.en: Enabling mipmap flag for SpriteAtlas will increase memory usage
longDescription.zh: 图集资源启用Mipmap标志会增加内存占用

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Texture -> Generate Mip Maps
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Texture -> Generate Mip Maps选项

description.en: SpriteAtlas should disable mipmap
description.zh: 图集资源应该禁用mipmap

description.en: check the SpriteAtlas compression format for iOS platform
description.zh: 检查iOS平台的图集压缩格式

longDescription.en: check the SpriteAtlas compression format for iOS platform
longDescription.zh: 检查iOS平台的图集压缩格式

nameDescription.en: the SpriteAtlas compression format for iOS platform

hint.en: If you decide to use default format setting, check the option under: Inspector -> Default -> Format. If you want to use platform-specific setting, navigate to the iOS tab aside, check 'Override for iOS' and modify the Format option below.
hint.zh: 如果希望对各平台统一设置压缩格式，检查Inspector -> Default -> Format选项; 如果希望为iOS平台单独设置，打开旁边的iOS选项卡，勾选Override for iOS并检查下面的Format选项

description.en: SpriteAtlas format for iOS platform should be astc
description.zh: iOS平台的图集格式应该是astc

description.en: Use default for iOS platform, but the format is not Automatic
description.zh: 对iOS平台使用默认值，但格式不是Automatic

description.en: check the SpriteAtlas compression format for Android platform
description.zh: 检查Android平台的图集压缩格式

longDescription.en: check the SpriteAtlas compression format for Android platform
longDescription.zh: 检查Android平台的图集压缩格式

nameDescription.en: the SpriteAtlas compression format for Android platform

hint.en: If you decide to use default format setting, check the option under: Inspector -> Default -> Format. If you want to use platform-specific setting, navigate to the Android tab aside, check 'Override for Android' and modify the Format option below.
hint.zh: 如果希望对各平台统一设置压缩格式，检查Inspector -> Default -> Format选项; 如果希望为Android平台单独设置，打开旁边的Android选项卡，勾选Override for Android并检查下面的Format选项

description.en: SpriteAtlas format for Android with OpenGLES3 or later should be astc
description.zh: 带有OpenGLES3或更高版本的Android的图集格式应该是astc

description.en: SpriteAtlas format for Android with OpenGLES2 or earlier should be etc
description.zh: 带有OpenGLES3或更高版本的Android的图集格式应该是astc

description.en: Use default for Android platform, but the format is not Automatic
description.zh: 对安卓平台使用默认值，但格式不是Automatic

description.en: Aniso level should not >1 for SpriteAtlas asset
description.zh: 图集资源的Aniso级别不应大于1

longDescription.en: SpriteAtlas with Aniso level setting over 1 will require larger memory usage and sampling rate
longDescription.zh: Aniso级别大于1的图集资源会增加内存占用和采样率

hint.en: Check the slide bar under: Inspector -> Texture -> Aniso Level
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Texture -> Aniso Level滑动条

description.en: SpriteAtlas aniso level >1
description.zh: 图集资源的Aniso级别大于1

description.en: It's recommended not to use Trilinear as filter mode for SpriteAtlas
description.zh: 图集资源的过滤模式不建议为Trilinear

longDescription.en: It's not recommended to use Trilinear as SpriteAtlas filter mode concerning its high computation resource usage.
longDescription.zh: 图集的过滤模式一般不建议使用Trilinear，会占用较高的计算资源。

hint.en: Check the option under: Inspector -> Texture -> Filter Mode
hint.zh: 检查Inspector -> Texture -> Filter Mode选项

nameDescription.zh: 检查图集资源的过滤模式

description.en: SpriteAtlas filter mode is Trilinear
description.zh: 图集使用了Trilinear过滤模式

description.en: Using Standard Shader in Material will increase loading time and ShaderLab memory size.
description.zh: 在材质中使用Standard Shader会显著增加加载耗时和ShaderLab内存大小

longDescription.en: Using Standard Shader in Material will increase loading time and ShaderLab memory size.
longDescription.zh: 在材质中使用Standard Shader会显著增加加载耗时和ShaderLab内存大小

description.en: Using Standard Shader in Material will increase loading time and ShaderLab memory size
description.zh: 在材质中使用Standard Shader会显著增加加载耗时和ShaderLab内存大小
